member_organisations:
Information about our member organisations can be found at this address: 
 
http://dfworldcouncil.com/aboutus/
eu_initiatives:
European Commission's transport policy, in particular in the maritime and aviation space. We are 
following the European Commission's Aviation Strategy and anticipate to be active on the announced 
Maritime Strategy package as well. 
We are also involved in aviation and maritime security issues. 
In addition we follow legislation of relevance to our members linked to the products sold in duty free and 
travel retail as well as other relevant legislation linked to the duty free market.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: DFWC Study 'Economic impact of duty free and travel retail in Europe 2015'
goals__remit:
Duty Free World Council is the global voice for the duty free and travel retail Industry. 
The industry’s regional associations from around the globe have come together to form the Duty Free 
World Council (DFWC) in order to highlight the importance of the duty free and travel retail industry in 
generating significant levels of employment and in providing vital revenues for the aviation, travel and 
tourism and maritime sectors. Council objectives include increasing awareness and knowledge of the 
industry, providing support to the industry’s regional associations and developing standards throughout 
the industry through educational activities.
